meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits the absorption or utilization of vitamins.
meanings.sent1: Taking too much of the antivitamin can stop your body from using important vitamins.
meanings.sent2: The antivitamin in this medication prevents the body from benefiting from essential nutrients.
meanings.sent3: It's like the antivitamin is playing hide-and-seek with the vitamins in your food!
meanings.sent4: The antivitamin acts like a shield, blocking the vitamins from entering your system.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the antivitamin as a gatekeeper, refusing entry to the vitamins your body needs.

meanings.definition: A compound that counteracts the effects of vitamins.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antivitamin to neutralize the excess vitamins in her system.
meanings.sent2: This antivitamin cancels out the positive impact of the vitamin supplements.
meanings.sent3: It's as if the antivitamin is in a battle with the vitamins, trying to cancel their effects!
meanings.sent4: The antivitamin works like an opponent, undoing the benefits of the vitamins.
meanings.sent5: Picture the antivitamin as a superhero villain, fighting against the good deeds of the vitamins.
